author: Byron Tau and Nancy A. Youssef
title: CIA Pick Haspel: Agency Wasn’t Equipped to Handle Post-9/11 Interrogation Program
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump’s pick to lead the Central Intelligence Agency told a Senate committee Wednesday that the agency was ill-prepared to run a detention and interrogation program established after the Sept. 11, 2001 terrorist attacks and that she wouldn’t restart any such program.
Gina Haspel, addressing the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence considering her nomination, didn’t in her opening statement fully repudiate the program many critics say amounted to torture. She said, however, that the agency had...
